Craftsperson

You took up a livelihood centered around your skill with a specific set of tools. You take great pride in your work and can glean a great deal of insight into the finer details (as well as notice the flaws) of the work of your peers, both contemporary and historical.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one of your ability scores by 2 OR two of your ability scores by 1.

Skills. Choose one from: History, Insight, Investigation, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand.

Tools. You gain proficiency with any one artisan’s tool of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the chosen proficiency.

Knowledge of the Craft. You have advantage on Intelligence checks made to recall information about the craft associated with your chosen artisan’s tool or objects associated with that craft. Additionally, you have advantage on Charisma checks made to haggle a buying or selling price for products associated with your craft. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.SH5IJT2BG6WUL4JC]{Knowledge of the Craft}

Structural Weakpoints. You deal double damage to objects. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.USCQEY2G3I50NTVM]{Structural Weakpoints}

Languages. One of your choice.
